attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have made this petition because I feel that sometimes it would be nice to try and preserve some of the older parts of Lowestoft and this petition has been made to save “ The High Street Chemist”, it’s part of  the original fishing village and too loose the ambience would be cruel.  So if you feel the way I do then, let’s try and keep our heritage and keep the newer buildings at arms length.

Renovations are due to take place within the next 18 months wouldn't it be lovely if we could stop this from happening, so please could you help me by signing my petition.

rejection.details: The petition should be a clear request for change in government policy
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
